TopicTitle: Direct Link to Spaceport through the Space Center

Articles.Content: It would appear as a fairly big building on the Kerbal Space Center, behind the VAB or between the R&D center and tracking station. In career mode, it would allow buying spacecraft from other players, donating a little bit of in-game currency to help players get a bit of a boost in their own career mode. It would cost a set amount to upload to it, and would sell for a set price depending on the size of the craft.

Are you talking about puting the ship sharing into the carreer mode by selling and buying ships from other players for ingame currency?

Thats a very good idea, unfortunatelly it sounds very exploitable.

I belive that when online mode comes, selling crafts to the other players on the same server will be the thing (career mode).

That would be really awesome.

Or even interexchange reputation, money or science, like trading.

But not via spaceport.
Yes, exactly. I was afraid that it would be exploitable, but I'm sure there's some kind of measure that could be put in to prevent exploitation.
